Recommendations: the college may consider expanding the consortium program to include the exchange of instructional materials and manpower resources with other institutions
properly signed documents may be considered in preparing evidences for each benchmark statement uploaded in the online accreditation
it is suggested that proper documentation should be established in order to protect the intellectual property right ipr of the author
it is strongly suggested that developed instructional materials of the faculty be reviewed and approved by the instructional materials committee and copyrightedpatented
the faculty are encouraged to conduct a study on the academic performance and retention rate of students
